issue.title: [Python] HDFS test failures

***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2306](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2306). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
